text: Pseudophilautus extirpo was a frog. It lived in Sri Lanka. This frog is extinct now. All the frogs of this species are dead. Scientists say they died because human beings changed the places where the frogs lived. One adult female frog measured 43.5 mm snout-vent length from nose to rear end. ==First paper== * ==References== Category:Frogs of Asia
title: Pseudophilautus extirpo
